content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Dear Yi-Nuo Wang, as landlord I aim to achieve the highest possible price for my property. Currently, I have an idea in mind but let us negotiate to find a mutual agreement. Please propose your desired rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg. If we reach an acceptable figure for me, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, a reason for ending the negotiation will be given.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position but as a budget-conscious student seeking an affordable place, I wish to keep the expenses low. Considering the apartment's location and features, I would like to suggest a monthly rent not exceeding 500 Euros. If this proposal does not meet your expectations, kindly inform me with a specific reason for not proceeding further.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While sympathetic to your financial constraints as a student, this proposed rent of 500 Euros falls significantly short of my initial expectations. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the suggested price would not cover my investment costs and maintenance expenses adequately. However, if you're willing to revise your offer, we can resume the discussion. Otherwise, TERMINATE.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
